<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="#a0e6b4a6cee1775e7acdae3d727257f56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getName() == <a href="#a8b49e58433399077293d346d94a5bacd">NVVM&#95;REFLECT&#95;FUNCTION</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getName() == <a href="#a4ecc6f9dcbb50864488f3a611034b14d">NVVM&#95;REFLECT&#95;OCL&#95;FUNCTION</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    assert(F.isDeclaration() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;reflect function should not have a body&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    assert(F.getReturnType()-&gt;isIntegerTy() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;reflect&#39;s return type should be integer&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    return false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="#ad5fd4f6372956a853ddbffb2ecc18ec6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 4&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armlowoverheadloops-cpp/#a3bf42baf773b375802538951c88d8e12">ToRemove</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94" lineLink="#a7912e2c418da1b73d4e33dc5342f1990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 4&gt;</a> <a href="#a7912e2c418da1b73d4e33dc5342f1990">ToSimplify</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Go through the calls in this function.  Each call to &#95;&#95;nvvm&#95;reflect or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm.nvvm.reflect should be a CallInst with a ConstantArray argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First validate that. If the c-string corresponding to the ConstantArray can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be found successfully, see if it can be found in VarMap. If so, replace the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses of CallInst with the value found in VarMap. If not, replace the use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with value 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The IR for &#95;&#95;nvvm&#95;reflect calls differs between CUDA versions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CUDA 6.5 and earlier uses this sequence:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %ptr = tail call i8&#42; @llvm.nvvm.ptr.constant.to.gen.p0i8.p4i8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        (i8 addrspace(4)&#42; getelementptr inbounds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           (&#91;8 x i8&#93;, &#91;8 x i8&#93; addrspace(4)&#42; @str, i32 0, i32 0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %reflect = tail call i32 @&#95;&#95;nvvm&#95;reflect(i8&#42; %ptr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The value returned by Sym-&gt;getOperand(0) is a Constant with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ConstantDataSequential operand which can be converted to string and used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for lookup.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CUDA 7 does it slightly differently:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %reflect = call i32 @&#95;&#95;nvvm&#95;reflect(i8&#42; addrspacecast</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        (i8 addrspace(1)&#42; getelementptr inbounds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           (&#91;8 x i8&#93;, &#91;8 x i8&#93; addrspace(1)&#42; @str, i32 0, i32 0) to i8&#42;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case, we get a Constant with a GlobalVariable operand and we need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to dig deeper to find its initializer with the string we&#39;ll use for lookup.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="#ae25b1e577bcd72ebc8b84b83aca02662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a4cfc8b177e8521a4b496ae2edff6244f">for</a> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/atomicexpandpass-cpp/#a1bcc06b1cb86bd0ea08f33323190bdaa">instructions</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CallInst&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;Callee = <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;getCalledFunction();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Callee || (Callee-&gt;getName() != <a href="#a8b49e58433399077293d346d94a5bacd">NVVM&#95;REFLECT&#95;FUNCTION</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    Callee-&gt;getName() != <a href="#a4ecc6f9dcbb50864488f3a611034b14d">NVVM&#95;REFLECT&#95;OCL&#95;FUNCTION</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    Callee-&gt;getIntrinsicID() != Intrinsic::nvvm&#95;reflect))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Improve error handling here and elsewhere in this pass.</span></CodeLine>
